## Bio

Amelia J. DuVall is a seabird ecologist and conservationist. She is pursuing a PhD from the School of Aquatic and Fishery Sciences at the University of Washington. She has worked with breeding seabird populations in southern California in collaboration with the California Institute of Environmental Studies (CIES), Channel Islands National Park, and USGS Western Ecological Research Center. Research interests include seabird population ecology, island ecosystems, and seabird conservation and resource management.
